page.title: 17Chiltonaires Jazzband.
page.content: The Chiltonaires Jazzband has nothing to do with dancing or pop music. We march in strict formation wearing our uniforms while playing tunes on our kazoos and keeping time on the drums. We wear a skirt of royal tartan, a black jacket, white gym shoes and socks, tartan tams and black sashes. The mace twirlers and mascot wear red jackets and black busbies with artificial plumes. On Saturdays we travel on hired buses to go to competitions where we win medals to display on our sashes. We practice every Monday and Wednes day at half past five. We enjoy the jazzband immensely. I have been a member for five years and Margaret joined a year and a half ago.
